item.title: Hourly Register
item.description: Everybody fill up forms! The hourly register form is a document which will be familiar to paid company workers in Spain. Introduced by law a couple of years ago, it makes everyone register at which time they start and stop working every day. A report is filled at the end of each month, signed and archived, and never to be seen again unless the company suffers an inspection or a legal problem arises.
